attributes.action: Facebook and twitter to remove all graphic and violant videos
attributes.additional_details:
Far to many times now have i logged onto Facebook and twitter and twitter and seen graphic violent videos posted and shared. videos such as people being shot in the head, and elderly women getting kicked and punched and left in a dieting state on the ground and pure evil animal abuse. after reporting all 3 videos i have received the same message and they are still on Facebook. the message
'Thank you for taking the time to report something that you feel may violate our Community Standards. Reports like yours are an important part of making Facebook a safe and welcoming environment. We reviewed the post you reported for containing graphic violence and found it doesn't violate our Community Standards.'
i have recently been to the news and had one of the extremely violent videos removed. please help stop these videos!!
